page.title: 03 A day in my family.
page.content: My name is Kate Surry. I live in Gordon Road. On a Sunday my brother and I get up at 07.30. Then at 0800 my Mum and Dad get up as well. We all get washed and go down to breakfast. For breakfast we have toast, tea and cereal. After breakfast I go and clean my teeth. Then at 10.05 my brother and I go to Sunday School. That finishes at 11.30. When I get back from Sunday School I change into my jeans and go and call for my friend Caroline. I play with her until 1300 which is when I go home for lunch. We finish our lunch at about 13.30. Then at 1400 we go to Nana and Grandad's house. They live in Essex. Our cousins are sometimes there. They are my Dad's parents. We return home at out 2100. When I get home I have a bath and clean my teeth and go to bed.
